page.title: 05ART & CRAFT IN MOORSHOLM
page.content: The Art & Craft work is centred around a weekly craft class organised by the Moorsholm Women's Institute but open to non-members. Activities included are: Jewellery making and repairing{*} Machine & hand knitting{*} Machine & hand sewing {*} Soft furnishing{*} Stick carving Weaving {*} Glass engraving Patchwork Soft toy making Collage Flower pressing Crochet Flower arranging Embroidery Hedge laying Woodwork Silver engraving{* Rug making Wine making Cake decoration Macrame Painting Tapestry Leatherwork Drawing Pyrography Music; piano, recorder, trumpet. The crafts followed by an{*}are worked on a commercial basis.
